QAPair.Question: What is (are) Kidney stones - self-care ?
QAPair.Answer: A kidney stone is a small solid mass made up of tiny crystals. Your health care provider may ask you to take self-care steps to treat kidney stones or prevent them from returning.

Question.qtype: when to contact a medical professional

QAPair.Question: Do I need to see a doctor for Kidney stones - self-care ?
